item.description:
When it comes to upholding the standards of honest American cuisine, no other Glastonbury steakhouse comes close.

Located just west of Glastonbury’s Main Street on tree-lined Glastonbury Boulevard,
J. Gilbert’s has been lauded as one of Glastonbury’s finest hidden gems. We serve center-cut Prime Angus beef cooked over an open wood fire grill and presented with graceful, personal service. Add in our succulent sides like Lobster Mac ’N’ Cheese or White Cheddar Chipotle Mashed Potatoes and settle in next to our roaring hearth for some well-deserved indulgence...COME JOIN IN ON THE FUN WITH AN EXCELLENT RESTAURANT AND RAVE REVIEWS.....http://www.jgilberts.com/Menus.aspx?826

group.name: Eat, Laugh, and Be Merry in West Hartford

item.name: 5 STAR FALL CLASSIC J GILBERTS WOOD-FIRED STEAKS AND SEAFOOD NOV 12 8:15pm
